name: OurLoveBoard
description: Write messages to your loved one
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' wss://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
